blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

body:
What I learned:

-Phil once got drunk and broke his hand, girl same.

-Phil didn’t have that much sex in college, girl same.

-Phil once walked in on some gay shit, girl same.


Conclusion: me and Phil had very similar experiences in our late teens/early 20’s and might in fact be the same person.

summary: i’ve been out of the phandom for years and it seems like every time i go back to check on how things are going it’s like...
body: i’ve been out of the phandom for years and it seems like every time i go back to check on how things are going it’s like visiting an awful family for a holiday. wow everyone’s still stressful af here and nobody agrees ok ok bye see you next thanksgiving, i’ll bring the apple pie.

summary: What even was the tweet? I never saw it, I just came online and there was drama?
question: What even was the tweet? I never saw it, I just came online and there was drama?
answer: It was this tweet and people were getting mad at dan for liking a tweet that was self deprecating and then apparently he disliked the tweet but it turns out the person who tweeted the tweet made their account private and that’s why it disappeared

reblog.comment: It was this tweet and people were getting mad at dan for liking a tweet that was self deprecating and then apparently he disliked the tweet but it turns out the person who tweeted the tweet made their account private and that’s why it disappeared

blog.name: it-hitsdifferent
blog.title: I guess I'm a phannie
blog.description: Cass//She/Her

summary: i just...  I love him a lot he means so much to me everything he’s done to help me I don’t even know where I’d start the way he...
caption:
i just… 

I love him a lot

he means so much to me

everything he’s done to help me

I don’t even know where I’d start

the way he talks about mental health and has opened up a bit over the years

I really admire him

such a great role model

i just…

ugh 

i love him

i don’t care about his mistakes because in the end he’s human

and it’s a good reminder that he is

because we put him on this pedestal where we think he has to be perfect

but he’s perfect to me

and I love him

so much

daniel howell is a legend

he does so much for so many people

he loves us even though we can be so fucking rude

and i think that’s really hard to do

but in the end… he cares about us and we care about him. Call him problematic and shit on him but that’s not being the bigger person…. that’s being a jerk.

summary: Achromatopsia - Chapter 1 - abnormalphangirl - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Achromatopsia - Chapter 1 - abnormalphangirl - Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 8/8
Fandom: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
Rating: General Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Phil Lester/Original Male Character(s)
Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester, Chris Kendall, PJ Liguori
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Soulmates, black and white, Colors
Summary:

I see red and yellow. All the colors they told us about. The greens and blues. But I would go back to black and white if it meant I didn’t have to live with the pain that you don’t see them too.
